atbat.des: Troy Glaus flies out to right fielder Carlos Quentin in foul territory.
atbat.des_es: Troy Glaus batea elevado de out a jardinero derecho Carlos Quentin en territorio de foul.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Mark Buehrle; Troy Glaus is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .983 OPS against them this season and .839 against everything else.
Mark Buehrle has thrown 81 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 87 over the past 10 pitches.
Mark Buehrle is really trying to keep Chipper Jones close; he is 5-for-5 in stolen base attempts this season.

pitch.cc: Mark Buehrle didn't stick to the scouting report; Brian McCann is hitting .583 this season against four-seam fastballs in that location.
